content:
# It appears that I do not have a stone furnace in my inventory, which means I will need to craft one before I can smelt the copper ore into copper plates.
# 
# To craft a stone furnace, I need:
# - 5 stone
# - 1 iron plate

# I currently have enough iron plates (40), but I need to gather stone first. Let's find the nearest stone resource and harvest enough to craft a stone furnace.

# Locating the nearest stone resource.
stone_position = nearest(Resource.Stone)  # Finding the nearest stone resource.
move_to(stone_position)  # Moving to the stone position.
harvest_resource(stone_position, quantity=5)  # Harvesting 5 stone from this location.
print(f"Inventory updated to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Displaying updated inventory after harvesting stone.
